name: @my-repo/my-fancy-accordion
description: Custom element that implements a collapsible content panel.

scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.publish:dryrun: npm run prepublish && npm version prerelease --preid=test && npm publish --dry-run --no-shrinkwrap --no-optional
scripts.publish:patch: npm run prepublish && npm version patch && npm publish --no-shrinkwrap --no-optional
scripts.publish:minor: npm run prepublish && npm version minor && npm publish --no-shrinkwrap --no-optional
scripts.publish:major: npm run prepublish && npm version major && npm publish --no-shrinkwrap --no-optional

author: Julia Matviishyna
